Articles.Content:
After the thread got locked, sal suggested a new thread, so here it is!

After landing a space plane into the ocean i have found ways of creating a space plane that floats.

Use MK1 Structural Tanks as floating devices

I want to see who can get a boat to ride the farthest,fastest, and also looks somewhat good.

Recommendations: The boat should be back heavy(because with my design the engine pushed it into the water)

multiple layers of structural tanks without decouplers between them(they dont like water)

So do u think you can make the best?
